sqlMap.insert: insert into employees (employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary) values (employees_seq.nextval, #firstName#, #lastName#, #email#, #phoneNumber#, sysdate, #jobId#, #salary#)
sqlMap.select: select employee_id as id, first_name as firstName from employees order by employee_id
